choices: the same build and weight as Rob
1.content:
It's the start of the summer, and Rob has had a great term of college! He's changed a lot this year; and in his eyes for the better.

Unfortunately his football team had to stop because they couldn't find a coach, but that didn't matter. Besides it meant Rob could spend weekends chilling instead of working out and training for football.

Rob's got blue eyes, dark blond hair and has a reasonably athletic body, about 170lbs which is 4 more than he was when he played football though it doesn't show on his 5'11'' body, yet!

Yeah, the more Rob though about it, the more he loved the thought of spending this summer just lounging around, partying and just generally enjoying himself! For the year he had managed to have a dorm room to himself, but he had recently received a letter from the dorm manager that a transfer student from another college would be moving to join Rob's college and so would be sharing the same room as Rob, with his permission.

Rob is a friendly lad, and has no problem at all in accepting a new room mate. In fact, he buys some party food so that they can get to know each other with a bit of a party feel to the night.

One hour before the new room mate is set to arrive, Rob gets changed. He wears his favorite jeans, but they're a little bit tight. Rob's about to look over in the mirror to see why, but there's a knock at the door. His new room mate, called Adam (Ad for short), is early. He gives the mirror a miss and eating a crisp on the way goes to meet his new room mate.

The door opens, and Rob meets Ad for the first time. He is about the same height, but with dark hair. He is also . . .
1.title: Meet Rob

choices: They are both looking rather bloated
They are both on the same college course
They have both gained 4 lbs recently
11.content:
'Hey' says Rob to his new room mate Ad, 'Hows things mate? Come in, I've bought some stuff so we can just chill out for the night. You know, just not have to cook or anything! By the way, I'm Rob, your room mate, and I'd like to think your mate in general.'

Ad walks in and see's the room filled with enough party food for 20 people! His eyes light up.

'What a welcome' he begins, 'I'm Ad. This is amazing! Though really I shouldn't! All i've done recently is eat and party, and what with not playing football this year I should change my lifestyle.'

'Ad, I know how you feel. I mean I used to play football too until this year, and the college life has got me hooked too! But you've gotta remember we ARE college lads, and this is what we do! Now grab yourself a beer and a burger, we've got the whole summer to relax!'

'With that attitude I can tell we're going to get on! But can I unpack first dude?'

Rob has no objection and Ad unpacks all his things and gets used to his new pad. He drinks a fair few beers and has a good chat with Rob whilst doing it. They are both the same height and build and have a lot in common!

After an hour they start on the food. The time flies by and after 30 minutes of talking, drinking, eating and having a good time, they realize . . .
11.title: Party Food

choices: How podgy and bloated Rob now looks
That they should really both weigh themselves
111.content:
Ad reaches his hand out to the pizza box to grab another slice, but can't feel anything in the box. He looks down and sees an empty box.

'Oh dear Rob, we ate all the pizzas man!'

'Never mind let's have a beer' replies Rob reaching down to the crate . . . empty. 'Oh man, we drank all the beers!'

The two are slightly confused but still a little hungry, and so order a pizza with two servings of chips, two servings of garlic bread and two bottles of pop. Ad especially is amazed at how much he has managed to eat but has to admit he is struggling to keep up with the pace of Rob.

The food arrives and not 30 minutes later it is all gone.

It is about this time when Ad realizes . . .
111.title: More Food for growing lads

112.content:
Rob looks over at Ad for the first time since he had started his eating binge, 2 hours ago. Although they had been talking to each other, both were too concentrated on food to worry about what the other looked like. Ad had changed . . .

Ads slim yet ample frame had grown by a couple of lbs, or so it looked like! Both were slightly bloated however and Rob looked down to see . . .
112.title: Ad gains

choices: Rob has gained up to 180lbs in 2 weeks
Ad has gained half as much as Rob, 5lbs in 2 weeks
1122.content:
'Oh my gosh' says Rob, 'I've gained like . . . loads since the start of the night, what have you been putting in my drink!?'

'Nothing' replys Ad, 'If anything you've put something in mine!'

Both look down and decide to take off their shirts. Ad's has definetily gained, and he boasts an inch of chub over his jeans.

Rob on the other hand looks down to see at least 3 inches worth of chub flopping over his boxer shorts, which were not to mention extremely tight!

'That's it chubby' says Ad, 'Let's go weigh you!'

The two head over to the scaled to check out what each of them weigh.

Without mention Rob is heavier than Ad!

Rob was 170lbs, and Ad was 165lbs, Now . . .
1122.title: Rob's chubby

113.content:
"Ad. You drank all the beer."
"Did not."
"Did too."
The boys argue and then stop.
Rob belches.
"That felt better," he announced . "But whoever drank the beer, we're out and since I provided the first round, it's your turn, Roomie."
"Id' be happy to oblige but I'm not sure I'd make it to the liquor store just now."
"I can relate." Rob answered but that doesn't solve our problem."
Ad grinns a shiteating drunk grin.
"I may have a solution." he slurred and he digs into his suitcase to bring out a handle of Jim Beam.
"My man." Rob slurrs right back. "You are a wizard and , if I might add, a Prince among men. Pass it over."
Two hours later, the roomates were passed out cold on the floor with an empty Jim Beam bottle and 24 beer cans.
Next morning the roomates wake up
113.title: They are both rather drunk

choices: Rob has eaten all the food
Rob decides he is going to fatten up Ad without him knowing
Ad gets a little drunks and starts asking Rob all about his weight
Ad tells Rob to start a fitness programme and they get weighed
12.content:
Rob comes face to face with his new room mate, and he is very slim, he makes Rob looks slightly chubby. In fact this is the first thing Ad says to him!

'Hey chubbs, I'm Ad' he says, giving Robs slim yet expanding stomach a pat.

Rob is a little confused and looks down at his stomach, but dismisses the comment and smiles. 'Hey Ad, I'm Rob, good to meet you mate.'

'Yeah, and you' says Ad whilst jutting out a hand for a hand shake. 'So, been skipping the gym lately bud?' he laughs.

'Talk later' says Rob with a laugh, 'let's get you settled in and unpacked, not to mention i've bought us some stuff for a good chill out later.'

Ad's eyes look about the dorm at the mounds of food and drink Rob had bought to make him feel welcome. 'I guess I could try living your life for the night!' With that Ad bursts open a can of beer and Rob follows suit, showing him the dorm and helping him unload his things.

The two then begin on the food and drink, whilst talking and chatting. Ad does his best to keep up with Rob but loses after 4 beers and 1 pizza, Rob just continues to eat and eat. Ad is amazed, and needless to say had a laugh with a fair few jokes about Robs lifestyle.

Later that night
12.title: Rob can eat

choices: Leave a ton of fast food and such around the dorm and arrange many parties
Change his muscle maintain shakes to weight gain shakes
122.content:
Rob is slightly confused about the comments Ad had been making. I wasn't even as if Rob was even chubby, he was slim + 4lbs he had gained recently from his more relaxed lifestyle. He looked down at his t-shirt, which was maybe a little small but nothing too drastic, and decided to spark the fire a little bit. He whips off his t-shirt and sits their eating his 3rd pizza and on his 7th beer, shirtless, and just letting himself relax and not worry about a thing.

Ad had been relieving himself in the toilet at the time, and wasn't expecting the view he got. Rob was sat their, with his small jeans looking a little snug on his thighs and waist; pizza in on hand beer in the other, and as bloated as ever. His small roll of chub just crested his belt which was undone and slightly pressured into his small stomach.

'WOAHH' begins Ad 'CHILL OUT WITH THE FOOD BIG MAN!' He yells. Rob ignores this and carries on, on purpose, with his food fest. Ad watches in amazement as Rob finishes off the last food and beer in the dorm and lets out a huge burp to compliment it all. Rob knew that what Ad says in the next 5 minutes will determine whether he will get Ad to gain weight without him knowing or not. Rob acts drunk and Ad being a half decent lad helps Rob to his bed. He lifts Rob up over his shoulder and comments on his weight.

'How heavy do you want to be chubbs' he says, 'I mean look at this!' He squeezes Robs small belly, which despite being bloated is still slightly soft. 'Mate, your going to be a bad influence on me!' Ad lifts Ad into his bed and leaves to his own.

That was the key Rob needed, hearing Ad almost admit he might gain a little weight without wanting to by living with him, was more than enough for Rob. He was going to let Ad feel what it felt like to be the butt of the gain jokes. But how should he do it?
122.title: Rob's Plan

1222.content:
It was early in the morning when Rob finally figured out how to fatten up Ad, he'd been up all morning thinking about how to get Ad back for being such an asshole. And then it hit him, he would fatten Ad up by replacing his Muscle Maintain Powder with Weight Gain Powder. Rob opened his laptop and searched online for weight gain powder and after some research, he found exactly what he was looking for...
The powder arrived two days later and as soon as it arrived Rob promptly dumped the old Muscle Maintain powder in the bin and replaced it with the Weight Gain Powder, -that luckily had been the same exact colour. He put the container back on the shelf and went to bed.

Ad came back from the showers his six-pack on full display, and Rob chuckled to himself, those were going to be gone in no time at all.

He watched as Ad took a scoop of the powder and blended it together, taking a large gulp of the shake after he finished. He was gonna get fat, and then he would be the one laughing.
1222.title: Change his muscle maintain shakes to weight gai...

12221.content:
After a week drinking weight gain shakes Ad start to put on the pounds. That makes him feel a bit lazier and more hungry.
Instead of excercising two hours a day he only do it for an hour.
In the morning he was getting dressed when he noticed a strange tightness in his skinny jeans.
"Hey Rob, am I getting a bit fat"
"No Ad, you're in a perfect shape, why?"
"I feel my jeans tighter"
"They must have shrunk in the wash"
"Yeah, that must be"
Rob was excited about that, Ad was getting a soft layer of fat in his ripped body.
Later in the gym Ad get on the scale, it gets up to 165, five pounds heavier than when he arrives.
'It's not fat, it's muscle, I'll increase my workout time and I'll drink more protein shakes so my muscles get bigger' he thought.
Then he workout for two hours and drink two shakes.
12221.title: Ad is pudgy

122211.content:
After a week, Ad get more pudgy but he didn't care cause he thinks is muscle.
"Rob look at my muscle"
"Yeah Ad, you're looking good" Rob lied.
"I think I'm going to take 4 or 5 shakes a day, that will make my muscles huge"
"Go for it boy"

Ad buys new clothes, a pair of 34 jeans and a L shirt so he can grow his 'muscle'.

After two weeks Ad was nearly fat but he was in denial until he burst all his wardrobe so he need new ones.
He drove to the mall and enter in the clothing shop.
The size 36 were a bit snug and the size 38 were just perfect so he buy two 38 and one 40.
Then he went to the shirts area, the L covered almost all his belly but it remarked it, then he realizes how fat he has got.
He was terrified but he need new clothes so he bought three XL and a pair of XXL.
When he get out of the shop he was hungry.
"Shit man, I'm really hungry, maybe I could go to McDonalds for some food"
He went to McDonald and he ordered 5 BigMacs, 3 fries, 2 shakes and a McFlurry for dessert.
He began eating, after all the food he felt bloated.
"This feels amazing, maybe being fat is not that bad, I wonder how much I weigh"
Back in college he gets on scale.
"Holy shit I weigh 190, I've gained 30 pounds since I got here"
"Who's the fatboy now?" said Rob

"You made it look awesome"
"You should try to gain some weight, it'll look good on you, and you can relax"

Rob got asleep thinking about Ad's proposal, he dream he got fat and how much he eat, he got bigger.
When he woke up he take a decision...

He woke up Ad to give him the notice, he was going to get fat.

"Do you want to go to m¿supermarket to buy food"

They bought a lot of fatty foods, pizzas, hamburgers, fries, candy, cakes, cookies they spend most of the money their parents send them for the month.
They arrive at their dorm and eat some of the things and then go to sleep."
122211221.title: Gain some weight

choices: You know what?  I think I do.
You're right, Ad.  I should keep myself in shape.
123.content:
A couple of hours later, Ad was starting to get a little tipsy. The topic of conversation turned again to Rob's weight.

"So how did you get so big, man?", Ad asked. "I mean, you look like you were an athlete not too long ago."

"Well, football season just ended, and I found out that we won't be having a season next year, so I decided to take it easy this summer instead of working my ass off for the team," replied Rob, as he shoved another handful of chips into his mouth.

"Hey, man, life doesn't end with football, you know," Ad warned. "Think of all those forty-year-old ex-jock guys with the huge beer bellies who hang out in dives wondering where the hell their lives went. Then they start having all kinds of health problems because they stopped taking care of themselves. Not to mention the fact that even their own wives won't sleep with them because they're so gross-looking. Do you want to be one of those guys, chubbs?"

Rob thought about it for a second, and then said...
123.title: About Rob's Weight

choices: The boys head to the gym
Rob decides to go to the bar instead
1232.content:
"You know what? You're right, Ad. I should keep myself in shape." Rob looked down at his roll of jelly.

Ad slapped Rob on the back and said "That's what I want to hear, man! Let's head down to the gym tonight and work off that blubber you're keeping stored there."

"Yeah, man. Can't wait."

A couple of hours later, after the guys' stomachs digest the junk food they'd scarfed down that afternoon....
1232.title: Rob Wants to Lose Weight

choices: It is too late...Rob begins to feel funny
Just in time! Rob vomits and...
12321.content:
The two boys make it to the gym, when Ad finally asks (as he had been wondering the whole time) "Why'd you bring me to the gym?"

Puzzled, Rob answers: "I thought we were gonna work out. I told you I wanted to get back in shape, remember?"

Ad lets out a laugh. "Rob. You didn't actually think i stay so fit by 'working out' do you?

Puzzled even more so, Rob asks: "Well then how do you stay so slim?"

Ad leans in to Rob.

"Rob my boy. It's called Vyolera. It's a secret weight-loss drug only available to aristocrats in France. Top secret."

Rob is in disbelief. He hadn't pegged Ad as the type to take such things.

"I've got bottles and bottles in my suitcases! It's great! Let's go back to the room so you can start your first cycle!"

The two boys make it back to the room and Ad pulls out the small, green bottle.

Rob holds it. "All the labeling is in French!"

"That stuff doesn't matter! It doesn't say anything of importance...just know that it works."

Finally, hesitantly, Ad convinces Rob to take three.

"Are you sure that it's safe?"

Ad says nothing and finally replies, snidely, with an odd twinkle in his eye: "Whoops. You know i should've mentioned this earlier... I completely forgot! It's deadly if you take more than one a day." Ad smiles, scarily.

Rob, overcome with fear and anger walks over to Ad and punches him out cold. He then runs to the bathroom and tries to vomit the pills. He hopes it isn't too late...
12321.title: Ad's Weight-Loss Secret

choices: tell the police to arrest Ad!

Rob, overcome with fear and anger walks over to Ad and punches him out cold. He then runs to the bathroom and tries to vomit the pills. He hopes it isn't too late...as he tries to vomit, he begins to feel funny. He calls 9-1-1 and the ambulance comes quickly. Finding Ad still out cold on the floor, they take both boys to the hospital, where the doctors hear Rob's story and quickly pump out his tummy. Fortunately, he had grabbed the green bottle of pills before the ambulance arrived, and the ER doctors set to work on an antidote.

Rob gets sent up to intensive care while Ad gets a police officer watching him in the ER. Finally they get the lab results and ...

14.content:
"Hey," says Rob to his new room mate Ad as he walks in, "How's things, mate? Come in, I've bought some stuff so we can just chill out for the night. You know, not have to cook or anything! I'm Rob, your new room mate, and I'd like to think your mate in general."

Ad sees that Rob has covered a table in food. His mouth waters at the sight, and his eyes light up.

"What a welcome!" He adds, "I'm Ad. This is amazing! Though really you shouldn't have! All I've done recently is eat and party, and I've put on a few," he says, bouncing a hand off his somewhat bulging stomach. "180 pounds! I should really change my lifestyle."

"Nah, not 'til the end of the summer," replies Rob. "I mean, I used to play football last year, but now college life has got me hooked! But, we ARE college lads, and its summer - time to relax, and not worry. If I put ona few, well, I'll run them off after summer's over! Now, grab yourself a beer and a bite, we've got the whole summer to relax!

"I like your style!" remarks Adam. "With that attitude I can tell we're going to get on! But can I unpack while I eat?"

Rob has no objection and Ad drinks a fair few beers and they have a good chat whilst he unpacks. They are both the same height, though Ad is heavier - maybe ten pounds, Rob guesses, though it could be more - and they have a lot in common!

Time flies by and after a couple of hours of of talking, drinking, eating and having a good time, they realize . . .
14.title: Rob and Ad get to know one another

141.content: The boys are on the sofa, watching football when Ad reaches into the crisp bag for another handful in between drinks. "Hey Rob, we're all out of food. I think we should..."

Shrug off the thought for now and ignore Rob
1412.content:
"Dude, I think we should slow down"
"Huh?"
"We ate all the food..."

Rob looked around them, wrapped of junk food and empty bottles of beer surrounding them. he told Ad "Oh, yeah"

"I don't want more than this anyway" Ad slapped his flabby belly under his t-shirt. It was showing rolls of fat as he sat down. Rob grinned at the sight "At least I have a flat gut"

Adam felt a bit baffled. He was a little bit jealous. He decided he'd just....
1412.title: ...ease up a bit

142.content:
Time flies by and after a couple of hours of of talking, drinking, eating and having a good time, Rob and Ad both sit back at the same time, and stretch . . .

"Feeling really full?" essays Rob.

"Yeah," replies Ad. "Time for a good sleep!"

The two lads wash and get ready for bed, and both sleep the sleep of the untroubled - neither has to get up first thing in the morning, so no alarms are set, but the sunlight streaming in the window does awake one of them earlier than the other - not to mention a rumblingly empty tummy! So which one is the hungry early bird?

He looked down and was shocked slightly at that. He poked the small roll of ft forming on the top of his pajama bottom and cringed,

"Shit, I must have gained weight"

Though, he could feel his stomach empty as it let a loud rumble. He decided he....

But as he does, a feels a sudden sense of freedom. He puts his arms down and looks down. His stomach had slipped out of pajama bottoms, a soft caramel colored roll of flab, peeking out from under his T-shirt. Damn, I knew I overdid it last night he thinks as he pokes his new chubbiness. But now it was a new day, and there was no doubt that he was starving!

145.content:
Time flies by and after a couple of hours of of talking, drinking, eating and having a good time, Ad says to Rob, "There, all done! Whew! Well, after all that, I expect I've added to the 180 - I'm sure I ate more than I worked off!"

"Hey, me too," says Rob. "But, you know, what's a few pounds here and there?"

"That's right," says Ad, downing another beer. He's got quite the buzz on, he's almost slurring his words. "Hey, 185 is find by me. My footie team is a long way from here..."

"... and mine closed down on me..." adds Rob, almost melancholy with drink.

"...but if I get too big for footie, I can always play American football....they like big guys...."

"Ain't it the truth? Those Yanks..."

"Ya know, it must be pretty cool being as big as that Gibson fella - 400 pounds! Jes' think, nobody'd ever bother ya, ya could eat anything tha wanted," Ad goes on.

"...if we could get that big?" asks Ad, slapping Rob in the gut.

"Hey mate, that thing's full..."

"Yeah? Let's keep it that way," says Ad.

"Nah, I wanna gain, and I need a gaining mate!"

The two tipsy roommates stumble out of the room and head for....

The two tipsy roommates stumble out of the room and head for a nearby pizza joint. They walk up to the counter, and the guy behind says, "What'll it be blokes? It's two for one tonight!"

"Hey, our lucky night! A beer each and...." says Ad, positively.
14512.title: It's two for one tonight?

145122.content:
"One large pepperoni for each of us. You are up to it arn't you Rob?
"You said it, old bud." Rob answered, "But one beer just isn't going to make it. Is everything two for one tonight?"
"Sure thing." The Counter Guy answered. "One pitcher each."
"Awesome!" Rob and Ad chorused together.
They carried their pitchers over to the big corner booth and settled in to wait for their pizza.
"I like that counter guy." Rob said downing his first glass of beer. "Let's give him a toast."
The two raised their refilled glasses to the counter guy and chugged.
By the time the pizzas arrived they were down to the last glass in each pitcher and were beyond tipsy. They motioned for the counter guy to bring two more pitchers and started eating.
"Thiss izz tha bessst pizzzzza ehvah." Rob was having trouble getting his words out but no trouble packing in the pizza.
Ad wasn't talking, just eating.
When they finished, the two just sat for a time feeling the heavy slosh of their beer heavy bellies.
Rob was the first to rouse from his stupor. He heaved himself up from the booth and stood unsteadily looking at Ad.
"Can you get up?" he asked.
In answer, Ad pulled himself up, steadying himself with the back of the seat "Sure I can get up."
"Then lets move along." Rob continued.
145122.title: a large pepperoni each

I'll trick him into gaining himself so I can get my own back

15.content:
Robs new room mate is obviously 10lbs heavier than Rob, if not more! However he is alot slimmer! He has a v shaped weist and bulging pecs! In fact, Rob is slightly taken back by him. Despite this, the new guy is very friendly and besides must be quite used to it!

Then Josh's face turns a little confused.

'Yeah, nice to meet you' starts Rob, 'what're you confused about?'

'Nothing' replys Josh. 'Just that prod was a lot softer than I thought it would be! Have you been munching?' He smiles.

Rob doesn't quite know what to say, so just invites Josh in, and in front of them both is all the food Rob has cooked to greet his new room mate.


Rob thinks . . .
15.title: Meet Josh

choices: Josh sits down with Rob to eat a healthy dinner.
Josh has burned his dinner, so he eats some of Rob's food.
151.content:
Rob smiled for a second and thought: I'll show him what munching is. And maybe he'll join in.

"Come on, sit down. You gotta be starving to death. Look, I cooked." He motioned to the spread of food he had out: four frozen pizzas, chicken wings with sauce, a case of beer, and his favourite, jalapeno poppers (his uncle from Louisiana had given him a small deep fryer to use at school).

"Hey, man, thanks for cooking, but I don't know if I should eat all this," Josh replied. "I gotta keep my figure," he added as he patted his probably rock-hard six-pack. "Besides, I brought my own food." He held up a couple of grocery bags, which made his biceps bulge against his already tight sleeves. He headed towards the kitchen and began to unpack.

"Alright, man, suit yourself," said Rob, as he sat down and began to devour the veritable buffet he had in front of him.

An hour later
151.title: I'll Show You

choices: Rob refuses to take his shirt off out of shame or pride
1511.content:
An hour later, Rob was still working on his jalapeno poppers, though he was starting to feel a little full. Josh sat down with a plate of steamed vegetables, rice and a breast of grilled chicken, which he'd done on the George Forman grill his dad had bought him as a going-away-to-college present.

"Dude," Rob said, between bites. "When you said you wanted to keep your figure, I didn't think you were on a diet. You gotta live a little. Have some poppers." He tossed a bowl of them at the muscle stud across the table from him.

"Hey man," Josh replied, "if you want to keep a bod like this, you gotta be consistent."

"Oh, like I haven't been consistent," Rob retorted. "I've been going to the gym at least three days a week ever since I started football in high school. I deserve a break every once in a while."

"It looks like you've been consistent, all right," Josh replied. "That mound of flesh I felt earlier says it's been consistent partying ever since the football season ended. You're gonna have a heart attack at 25 at this rate."

"All right then," said Rob, as he stood up. "If you're so hot, why don't you show me this ripped bod you're so proud of."

Josh stood up, and without saying a word, pulled his black muscle tee over his head, revealing a body that would make most fitness models blush. He had a perfect set of 8-pack abs, sitting below an ample pair of pecs that jutted just perfectly out from his torso, shoulders that just begged to be massaged, and of course those amazing biceps that lived inside his tanned, paper-thin flesh, jumping every once in a while with the little movements that come from being human.

"All right," he said. "I showed you what I've got. Now let's see what you have."

Rob hesitated for a moment, and then...
1511.title: Show Me What You've Got

choices: "How could this have happened to me?"
"Oh well, what's a bit of extra flesh?"
15111.content:
Rob knew he had nothing to worry about. He was a football star, who all the girls adored, and a little partying this year wouldn't change any of that!

"Fine, get a load of this, stud!" With that, the shirt was off, and the damage done to his body was revealed. He still had remnants of his old body, with good strong shoulders and a half-decent set of pecs. It was clear, though, that his body was starting to go. His pecs, reasonably impressive though they were, were starting to sag a little, and his arms appeared softer and less defined than they would have been if he had been playing football regularly. Nowhere was his laziness more apparent than his waist, however. His jeans clearly gave away the roll of flab that was starting to make its way there, just enough to sit about an inch over the waistband, and he was starting to get flabby around the love handles. His six-pack abs, which had stood out proudly only a few months before, were buried under this new layer of fat, with little hope of being able to surface again.

Josh sighed. This guy was obviously in denial, or else just hadn't been paying attention to the way his body was going to pot. He'd seen friends go through this before, in fact, one guy had been a model before he got fat from all the partying that came with his profession. "Have you taken a good look at yourself lately, Rob?" asked Josh.

"What are you talking about?"

"Do you have a mirror around?"

"Yeah, there's one in my room." Rob led the way, feeling rather suspicious of what was going on. Rob was actually a little afraid of what he might see.

"Look in the mirror, and tell me what you see."

"I see me," said Rob, as he looked at himself in the mirror.

"Look carefully," said Josh, moving a little closer.

Rob thought about it, not knowing what he was looking for. And then it hit him. His jeans had been tight when he put them on, and he didn't know why. He hadn't had a chance to look. Now he could see, and he was shocked. He pinched the roll of flab at his waistline, and said....
15111.title: The Revelation

choices: start an intense workout program to become a muscle stud.
keep gaining weight until Rob's as fat as Josh was.
151111.content:
"How could this have happened to me?" Rob said, his voice cracking just a bit. "I used to be so in-shape, and I've never had to care about my weight before. God, I've turned into such a lardass. What am I gonna do?"

And with that, he gave away completely. He started sobbing uncontrollably.

Josh put an arm on Rob's shoulder. "Hey man, there's nothing to cry about. You can fix it."

"Easy for you to say," Rob retorted through his tears. "Mister Fitness Model here who actually enjoys all those fat-free foods. You've probably had it easy your whole life too."

"That's not true," Josh said, calmly, as he moved closer to the sobbing Rob. "Look, I haven't told too many people this, but I used to be incredibly obese. When I was fourteen, I was around three hundred pounds and climbing. I'd eat fatty foods all day long. I couldn't stop myself. I actually had an addiction to food. My parents put me on a diet and got me exercising around that time, and it took me three years to finally get a hold of these puppies." He patted his abs. "That's why I was so concerned when you sat down to eat all that food. I didn't want you to end up like I did."

"Oh my god," said Rob. "I had no idea."

"You wouldn't have had any idea," said Josh.

"I'm sorry," said Rob, looking him straight in the eye as he said this.

Josh met his gaze, and then said: "You want to make it up to me?" he asked.

"Yes," said Rob, wanting to make things right with his roommate. "I'll do anything."

"Anything?"

"Yeah, anything."

Josh grinned slyly and said, "All right. I want you to...."
151111.title: Rob Despairs At His New Weight Gain

1511111.content:
Josh met his gaze, and then said: "You want to make it up to me?" he asked.

"Yes," said Rob, wanting to make things right with his roommate. "I'll do anything."

"Anything?"

"Yeah, anything."

Josh grinned slyly and said, "All right. I want you to lose this flab," he poked Rob's small accumulation of chub. Rob flinched as he felt the finger bury itself into the flab as it sought out his weakened abs. "That's gonna do you no favours. And I want you to start working this muscle again. It looks like you used to have a pretty good frame. Flex that arm for a sec."

Rob did so, and his 15" bicep popped up. Rob had always been rather proud of his arms. Josh put his strong hands around the bicep and squeezed it. With what didn't appear to be much effort, he was able to squeeze right through it. "Yeah, that definitely needs work," he said. "But hey, we can work on that. I'll train you myself. It'll be fun. What do you say?"

Rob looked Josh over. He had a great body, and honestly, it was making him a little hot just thinking about it. He didn't want to be another fat college guy, but at the same time, his lifestyle thus far had been fun.

Will he do it?
1511111.title: Work Out with Me

15111111.content:
"Yes...I'll do it!"Rob said with much determination. Besides, its not often when a well built 8 packed guy wants to train you to become him...
"Ok...Now i need you to start tomorrow.Alright?"
Rob nodded.
15111111.title: Training Plans

151111111.content:
"Come on! One more rep!" Josh was encouraging Rob. They were on the bench press, and Rob was pressing 175, a full 25 lbs. below his normal maximum. Josh was spotting him, and doing a great job of it, too. Josh could see that Rob was struggling, so he put his fingers under the bar, ever so gently. This gave Rob just enough lift to be able to complete the rep. His arms jerked upward, and Josh took the bar and placed it back in the rack. Rob just lay there, out of breath, sweating through his T-Shirt, his face purple and vein-ridden with the effort.

"Wow," said Rob, panting. "I didn't realize I was that bad off."

"Hey, man, this is just a starting point, and 175 is nothing to sneeze at. Most guys can't even do 100. You'll be pushing over 200 in no time." Josh clapped Rob on the shoulder, then reached out with his other hand to help him up off the bench. Rob took his hand and, with a slightly pained grunt, he stood up.

Josh clapped his hands together and, grinning, said "All right, my turn! Load about 270 on there! That's my warmup weight." Josh winked.

Good God, thought Rob. That's 90 pounds more than the guy weighs! And he says that's his warmup weight??? Rob didn't believe him, but he loaded the weight on anyway. He wanted to see just how fit his buff new roommate and now trainer really was. Rob loaded up the bar (the plates felt a little heavier than he remembered, particularly in the case of the 45s, though he was still able to manage them), and Josh laid down on the bench, his rock-hard pecs moving hypnotically up and down as he took a few breaths before beginning. He lifted the bar off the weight rack and brought it right down to his nipples in a perfect, fluid motion. Before Rob knew it, the bar was in the air again. Josh did ten perfect reps like that before putting the bar back on the rack. With every rep, Rob watched in awe as Josh's magnificent pecs flexed with every movement, squeezing inward with the upward motion of the bar. When Josh was done, he sat up and looked at Rob.

"What?" he asked, and Rob realized that he was staring at his roommate, slackjawed.

"Erm, nothing, I've just never lifted that much before in my life. And you're only ten pounds heavier than me."

"Wrong, little buddy, six pounds heavier than you," Josh winked at his roommate. "Remember you have this" he poked Rob in the gut "now."

"Hey!" Rob exclaimed as he reflexively took a step back. Josh just laughed.

"Relax, little buddy. We'll turn that pudge into something more like this" he flexed his pecs "in no time. You used to be in shape. You'll have muscle memory."

Rob smiled and said "All right, meathead. If that's your 'warm-up' weight, let's see you pump some real iron. How does 290 sound?"

Josh smiled and nodded. He got down on the bench again. When Rob had put the new plates on, he did ten more perfect reps, though Rob could see he he had to work a bit harder at it this time, noting the decreased speed at which the reps were performed. For Josh's third set, Rob added another 10 lbs onto the rack, for a total of 300 lbs. Josh got through the first seven all right, but then his pecs started to fail, and he called for a spot. Rob put his fingers under the bar, just gently enough to give Josh some support. Josh pushed upwards, finishing the seventh one. He seemed to hesitate for a moment, looking unsure whether he wanted to put the bar down on the rack or keep going.

"Come on, meathead. You can do it," said Rob. He looked Josh right in the eyes as he said this. "Show me what real muscle can do."

Josh grinned through his efforts and brought the bar back down to his chest, Rob supporting the bar the whole time with his fingers. He pushed back up again, straining with the effort. Rob was glad he had worn his loose workout shorts. The sight of Josh's massive pecs pumped full of blood was enough to send blood to one particular part of Rob's anatomy.

Only one more to go. Josh pressed the bar down again, and then pushed, slowly but surely, upwards using all of the strength his barrel chest contained. He stopped about halfway up, and looked almost as if he was about to give up.

"I don't think so," said Rob. "I've seen you push this bar nine times. You can do one more. You're not copping out yet. Push it!"

That was all it took. Josh summoned a store of strength that could only have come from sheer determination, and pushed the bar swiftly up to its maximum height. Rob quickly took the bar and guided it onto the rack. Damn, that thing's heavy, he thought.

Josh was lying there, catching his breath, his massive chest heaving as he did so.

"Wow," Josh breathed. "I've never been able to get through a full set at that weight. You're a good spotter."

"Thanks," Rob said, though his eyes were on his roommate's pecs the whole time.

Josh waved a hand nonchalantly in front of Rob's face. Rob snapped up and looked at the model before him. "Come on, doughboy. Let's do some incline presses next." Josh headed off to the dumbbell rack, but before he did, Rob was sure he gave him the slightest wink that didn't seem altogether innocent.

***

Two hours later, Rob was lying, sore as all hell, on the couch in the dorm. Josh was in the kitchen, getting some food together for them (healthy food this time). Despite the soreness, though, Rob was stoked! He couldn't wait for the next time he got to work out with Josh! Even taking into account Rob's least favourite part, running on the treadmill, which Josh made him do for a minimum of 20 minutes to burn the layer of goo that had settled in around his once tight abs, he wanted to go back to the gym the next day. That, and they had only worked chest and back that day. He wanted to see how much Josh could curl with those arms....
151111111.title: They go to the gym

1511111111.content: Rob watched Josh complete his last set of curls using 150 lb weight. Rob had told Josh he couldn't do it which of course had the effect of ensuring Josh would do it. It took a week, but he worked up those biceps to do those curls with ease. Wow, those biceps! Man, Josh's biceps were getting so big & so hard, which made Rob's love muscle hard. He had also noticed how Josh was eating more to build up those shoulders and arms. Was Josh trying to impress Rob with his strength? If so, it was working. "Hey Josh, let's take some measurements starting with our biceps", said Rob.
1511111111.title: One Week Later

1511112.content:
... fully rely on me and eat everything I tell you."
"Ok, I will do waht ever you want"
Josh went to Rob and patted his soft hips. Josh said softly, "something can be done with your lovehandels fatboy"
The next day there was a huge rich breakfast and a plan how Rob should eat and move.
Every 2 and a half hours he should drink a shake from Josh, it was very fatty and sweet but incredible tasty!
For lunch, he had to eat everything that came to the table, besides, Josh pinched Rob every second in his growing fat rolls and creaming him while Josh told him how fat he was.

Later
1511112.title: keep gaining weight until Rob's as fat as J...

choices: Josh calls his friend Brad to eat with him
1512.content:
An hour Rob had eaten about 2 frozen pizzas, 6 beers, some chicken wings, and started eating some peppers. Rob started to feel stuffed after an hour of constant eating. His stomach was severely bloated with being hard and firm. While Rob was eating for an hour Josh started cooking his healthy dinner of grilled meat and vegetables on his George Foreman grill his dad gave as a going away gift. But as Josh left for a moment for a bathroom break his food got all burned and not eatable. So he had only one option left eat some of Rob's greasy food. But Josh didn't want to but his stomach was rumbling and he needed to have something to eat.

"Hey man, could I have some food please?" Josh said.

"Why should I? I offered it to you before but you said no because you wanted to eat healthy." Rob was still concentrated on the peppers.

"Please I'll do anything?" Josh then realized he might have made a mistake in saying anything.

"Anything?" Rob looked up from his food.

"Yeah bro you name it," Josh seemed hopeful that Rob would let eat some food, but at the same time he was afraid.

"Alright if you really want this that badly you are going to have to promise me three things. First no more going to the gym," Rob began.

"Really I love the gym that's like my second home! Plus that's how I stay lean and hunky." Josh said

"Okay that means you don't want some food and I can see your really hungry!" Rob confidently said.

"Um ok," Josh was shocked that he said that. But it was his stomach talking.

"Second you have to come eat me wherever I go. And last bring your workout buddies so they can have bellies," Rob thought that by doing this Josh would be more relaxed.

"Whatever you say bro" Josh thought that was going to be hard to do. But he was hungry and needed something to eat even if that means he loses his abs.
1512.title: A Deal with the Devil

choices: Josh returns, and the plan begins to work.
Josh returns, and he apologizes for how he treated Rob the week before.
152.content:
Rob couldn't believe what an idiot the dorm managers had stuck him with. The guy was a total prude! He didn't even eat any of the food that Rob had so kindly picked up for his welcoming! Rob naturally didn't want any of it to go to waste, so he ate almost the whole thing himself. Josh, however, took great pleaure in sitting there the whole time teasing him mercilessly. Rob knew that he had to do something about this guy, or else the next year was going to be hell.

That night when the two of them had gone to bed, Rob looked at himself in the mirror. Sure, his waist had gone to pot a little, but he had been relaxing. He wanted this weight to go onto Josh's prized body, though. Turn all that nice rock-hard muscle into doughy flab. Then he wouldn't have anything to brag about. The very thought of his chiseled abs softening and expanding until they were hopelessly covered by a giant belly of fat made Rob meliciously giddy. He knew he had to make it happen. At the same time, he would watch his own weight, and when the time was right, he would reveal an amazing body and laugh openly at Josh, the former stud, and his horribly obese body.

That weekend, Josh went to visit his uncle in another city, so he wasn't around. Rob set to work quickly. He bought some weight gain powder from the local health food store, as well as some appetite stimulant and sleep inducer. That way, Josh would be taking in more calories through his supplements and his intake of food, while also being too lethargic to work out. He replaced Josh's protein powder supplement with the weight gain powder (luckily they were the same colour), and shot Josh's food full of appetite stimulant. He put the sleep inducer into Josh's milk. Rob couldn't wait for all this to start taking its toll.

On Monday....
152.title: Gaining Josh

choices: Josh wakes up while Rob is rubbing his stomache
1521.content:
"hey man, welcome back!" said Rob. "Well getting away is good" replied Josh. "But I'm just happy to be back."
Josh sniffed the air. "hey, what's that smell?" Oh I decided to make your dinner." said Rob. "All that helth food stuff you like, it's sort of a sorry gift. With a physique like yours it's your right to point out the deficiencies in others." Rob said, but his thoughts said defferently. <enjoy the food> Rob thought, <Soon YOU will be the one whose the butt of MY jokes!>

They both entered the kitchen and the table was laid. "Wow, thanks Rob, you're a real pal!" Said Josh as his stomache rumbled loudly. "Well I guess that means it's time to eat!" Said Josh with a big smile on his face. <Yeah, keep smiling> thought Rob. Josh began to did in, but so did Rob. <The beauty was,> thought Rob, <Since Josh liked the "healthy" food, all the stuff on his side was spiked! He wouldn't even give a second thought to why I am eating different food than him!>

Josh noisly inhaled his food and drink. All the while Rob was smiling inwardly. In a short amount of time Josh had inhaled all his food. Staring miserably at his plate his belly rumbled, for he was still hungry! "Uh, Rob you didn't happen to make more of my food did you?" <Must act surprised!> thought Rob. "Well actually yes I did, I thought you would be extra hungry from jetlag." replied Rob plausibly. Loading up Josh's plate with ALL the extra food he make for him. Josh quickly set to work on this! While Josh was stuffing his face Rob prepared Josh's "healthy" parfait dessert. Really it was loaded with sleeping drugs and digestive aiders. Rob used a glass two times larger than the one he thought Josh would have used.

Just as Rob finished putting all the layers of Josh's dessert he found that Josh was already done his extra helping. "Dude," he said eying the parfait "I hope that's mine!" It is Josh, say, did you like the way I made your meal?" asked Rob innocently. "Yeah, it was great dude." said Josh as he started work on the parfait. "Well it's more convinient for me when I make my dinner to make yours as well, is that okay?" asked Rob, hoping for a yes. "Sure that sounds great!" said Josh halfway done the parfait. Rob noticed how taught Josh's abs were, straining to hold back all the food Josh had just eaten.

Rob just watched as Josh spooned in the last half of the parfait. The dopey look in Josh's eye told Rob the sedatives were working. As Josh finished, face flushed from the effort of stuffing so much food into his shrunken bell, he said: "Wow Rob, you really outdid yourself, if I keep eating like this I'll get even fatter than you!" He said jokingly. Josh, struggled to rise from the chair but managed to waddle to his bed and lie down, fast asleep. Seeing Josh's round gut and the abs holding in his bloated stomache slowly dissapearing from the digesting food, Rob found the thought of it thurning him on. "That's the plan Josh, that's the plan" whispered Rob quietly as, surprisingly ,he gave Josh a short, but plesureable belly rub.
1521.title: Josh get tricked!

info.brief_description: Rob is 18, young and single, however the constant eating is having it's effect
info.description:
Rob is 18 years old, and has always been the typical lad - partys, football, food and beer! Before now his weight has never been a problem, football games and such have kept the chub which should have come, away. After a great term of college and partying like crazy, and the end of his football team, Rob's party life will soon begin to show!

If you like the sound of the story, then please add and enjoy.

Rock On!
